"Shops":
"Shops

At shops, you can buy the items you need and sell those that you don't. You can even buy back items that you sold by accident. On the Goods List, use up/down to move the cursor to the item you want, left/right to specify a quantity, then select the Buy button. The process for selling items from your Inventory works in a similar manner.

See the Online Manual below for more information:
<&URL pso2_players_manual_preparations_arkslobby_shoparea>"
